name: COPASI
description: COPASI is a C++-based software application for the simulation and analysis of biochemical networks and their dynamics.

citations.title: COPASI and its applications in biotechnology
citations.authors: Frank T. Bergmann, Stefan Hoops, Brian Klahn, Ursula Kummer, Pedro Mendes Jürgen Pahle & Sven Sahle

citations.journal: Proceedings of the 2006 Winter Simulation Conference, Monterey, CA, USA

algorithms.name: Automatically use LSODA or LSODAR as apropriate for the given problem. Use LSODA if the problem has no roots. Use LSODAR if the problem has roots.

citations.title: LSODA, ordinary differential equation solver for stiff or non-stiff system
citations.authors: Alan C. Hindmarsh & Linda R. Petzold

citations.authors: Alan C. Hindmarsh & Linda R. Petzold

algorithms.name: Implicit Runge-Kutta method based on Radau quadrature.
